name: Amazon VPC NAT Gateway
short: A service in Amazon VPC that allows instances in a private subnet to connect to the internet or other AWS services, but prevents the internet from initiating a connection with those instances.
description: Amazon VPC NAT Gateway is a service that enables instances in a private subnet to connect to the internet or other AWS services, but prevents the internet from initiating a connection with those instances. It's highly available, resilient, and automatically scales to accommodate bandwidth demands. It also supports burstable performance up to 10 Gbps. NAT Gateway is a solution for those needing internet access for data downloading, software updates, or AWS connections without exposing their internal systems.
